backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping splash screen and Tailwind animation features to their source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptive summaries of their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style definitions with CSS variables for themes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React landing page including header, hero, content sections, and the SplashOverlay component.
frontend/src/components/SplashOverlay.ts: Fullscreen animated splash logo that plays a pop animation then fades out, respecting reduced-motion settings.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialsCaro: Interactive testimonials carousel with navigation and star ratings.
frontend/src/content/rates.ts: Exports predefined rate option objects with tiers, features, and pricing placeholders.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for handling Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes, base typography, and reducedâ€‘motion handling for splash animation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles and rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with plugins, custom colors mapped to CSS variables, extended animations, keyframes, shadows, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests related to the splash animation and Tailwind utilities.
